reviews.title: Beware...
reviews.comment: The stories under \"odd news\" are all horse $h!t, from \"The Onion\".  Dont expect actual news stories or even decent humor.  Be prepared to be grossed out with lewdness and X-rated language. NOT FOR KIDS!
reviews.author: Andrew Brownlee

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: I love this application
reviews.author: Crista Burnett

reviews.title: Nice app!
reviews.comment: I just put this on two Toshiba thrives and it rocks. I put it up there with feedly, stumble and the rest. Its good for the brain.  Nice work!

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: I cannot change my location for the weather. I do not get notifications. Good app fix those two for my divice and it will be a five

reviews.title: Nice app

reviews.author: Ronald Jones

reviews.title: Disappeared...
reviews.comment: Once i had the app for about a week, all of the main icons to click on for world news, US news and everything else has started disappearing. Now i only have three things i can choose from. Weather/traffic for new york when i live in ohio. Some technical trash i dont care about or some radio station options which i dont care about. Uninstalled and im reporting as spam.
reviews.author: Devin Lee

reviews.title: It works great every time
reviews.comment: I have tried every aspect of this app, including live NewsRadio, and it works great.
